returns.upkeepNeeded: as true if performUpkeep() needs to be called, false otherwise. performData returned empty.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.podIndex: The position of the pod in the Registry

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

PODS_PACKED_ARRAY_SIZE.details: Fixed length of the last upkeep block number (multiple this by 8 to get the maximum number of pods for storage)

ErrorCallingDrop(string).notice: Emitted when the drop() call reverts

PodsRegistryUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when the address registry is updated

UpkeepBatchLimitUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when the upkeep max batch is updated

UpkeepBlockIntervalUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when the upkeep block interval is updated

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Checks if Pods require upkeep. Call in a static manner every block by the Chainlink Upkeep network.

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Performs upkeep on the pods contract and updates lastUpkeepBlockNumbers

podsRegistry().notice: Address of the registry of pods contract which require upkeep

readLastBlockNumberForPodIndex(uint256).notice: Get the last Upkeep block number for a pod

updateBlockUpkeepInterval(uint256).notice: Updates the upkeepBlockInterval. Can only be called by the contract owner

updatePodsRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address registry. Can only be called by the contract owner

updateUpkeepBatchLimit(uint256).notice: Updates the upkeep max batch. Can only be called by the contract owner

upkeepBatchLimit().notice: Maximum number of pods that performUpkeep can be called on

upkeepBlockInterval().notice: Global upkeep interval expressed in blocks at which pods.batch() will be called

userdoc.notice: Contract implements Chainlink's Upkeep system interface, automating the upkeep of a registry of Pod contracts
